name: OK BOOMER
description:
They don't pay me enough to write good ad copy, god damn boomers.

Blow up your mates! Technicolour explosions! Really bad memes! I really need this paycheck!

Requires gamepads to play, let me know if you have a gamepad that doesn't work!

Press any button to enter the game when in the lobby, and enter the teleporter once all the players have joined!

Controls:

  • Left stick - Movement
  • Right stick - Aiming
  • Right trigger - Fire
  • Left trigger/A (Xbox) - Jump
  • X (Xbox) - Pickup
  • Esc key - Close game

Tips:

  • You can wall jump for improved mobility!
  • If you crouch while running, you'll enter a slide! Use this to get under small gaps quicker
  • Weapons have limited ammo, shoot wisely!
